function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to aerosolized viruses in the UV exposure chamber","Impact":"Risk of viral transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of the UV exposure chamber","Technologies":"Far-UVC lamp, HEPA filters","People":"Researchers, lab personnel, and anyone in proximity to the chamber","Owner":"Lab personnel, facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection of the UV exposure chamber","Impact":"Unwanted contamination and viral transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HEPA filters, proper positioning and calibration of the far-UVC lamp","Technologies":"Far-UVC lamp, HEPA filters, disinfectant solutions","People":"Researchers, lab personnel, and anyone in proximity to the chamber","Owner":"Lab personnel, facility management"},{"Description":"Inefficient dosimetry of the UV exposure chamber","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of UV fluence for aerosol disinfection","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and maintenance of dosimetry equipment","Technologies":"Dosimetry equipment, calibration tools","People":"Researchers, lab personnel, and anyone involved in dosimetry measurements","Owner":"Lab personnel, facility management"}]}
